issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement SQL CASE WHEN physical expression
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10679](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10679). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement SQL CASE WHEN expression so that we can support TPC-H query 12 fully.

 

Postgres: <https://www.postgresqltutorial.com/postgresql-case/>

Spark: <http://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/sql-ref-syntax-qry-select-case.html>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10679?focusedCommentId=17237564) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8740
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8740>
